column1: Smoque BBQ////So I have kind of avoided this place just because I figured Smoque was just a lot of hype. I was wrong. I had the pulled pork sandwich
column4: and delicious. The Memphis sauce that came on the side was amazing as well. The fries were great
column5: and the mac and cheese was otherworldly. I wish you could order larger portions of the mac and cheese
column6: though. I had to take a star off for the wait
column7: though. We waited in line for over 45 minutes just to ORDER. That's kind of ridiculous. They should really consider having more than one register. But they're BYOB
column8: so I'll definitely be back with a 6 pack during a not-so-busy time!
